title: We the Fans: Section 250 of Soldier Field
overview: In We the Fans: Section 250 of Soldier Field, we follow the the lives of Chicago Bears season ticket holders in Soldier Field's Section 250. Experience the game from the perspective of this band of true believers. Fans in Section 250 are a family, bound by faith in the Bears and one another. Win or lose, it's a place to be, to belong.
